description: Lists all the topic rule destinations in your Amazon Web Services account. Requires permission to access the ListTopicRuleDestinations action.

nested_items.name: destinationSummaries
nested_items.description: Information about a topic rule destination.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the topic rule destination. Valid values are:

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The date and time when the topic rule destination was created.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time when the topic rule destination was last updated.

nested_items.name: statusReason
nested_items.description: The reason the topic rule destination is in the current status.

nested_items.name: confirmationUrl
nested_items.description: The URL used to confirm ownership of or access to the HTTP topic rule destination URL.

nested_items.name: vpcDestinationSummary
nested_items.description: Information about the virtual private cloud (VPC) connection.

nested_items.name: subnetIds
nested_items.description: The subnet IDs of the VPC destination.

nested_items.name: securityGroups
nested_items.description: The security groups of the VPC destination.

nested_items.name: roleArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of a role that has permission to create and attach to elastic network interfaces (ENIs).

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The token to use to get the next set of results, or null if there are no additional results.
